name: L.S.S II
description:
FULL RELEASE FEATURES!

  • An insane amount of weapons at your disposal!
  • Even more perks and upgrades!
  • All new enemy types to keep you on your toes!
  • New maps and gamemodes along with some remastered maps!
  • Play alone or with friends in cooperative multiplayer!

EARLY ACCESS FEATURES!

  • A handful of weapons
  • A few perks to use in all gamemodes
  • Walking, Running and brute enemy types
  • Play survival on Factory
  • Cooperative multiplayer!

Note: The store page will go through some changes over the next coming weeks.
